mapper.update: UPDATE board SET title = #{title}, contents = #{contents} WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT b.id, b.title, b.contents, b.hit, b.reg_date as regDate, b.g_no as gNo, b.o_no as oNo, b.depth, b.user_id as userId, u.name as userName FROM board b LEFT JOIN user u ON b.user_id = u.id ORDER BY b.g_no DESC, b.o_no ASC LIMIT #{currentpage}, #{pagesize}
